ValidationRule.description: You can not set this RFC Task Case to Accepted until the Related RFC has a Risk Value generated. Return to your RFC and select "Pickup RFC" to complete the Risk and Impact details.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Related_RFC__r.Risk__c,"Complete Risk Assessment Tab"), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", RecordType.Name = "PGi-RFC Task", ISPICKVAL(Status,"Accepted") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Users cant set a Case to Accepted if the Related RFC still has the Risk to be completed
